channel.title: <> /// PROJECT BLITZ v2 OPEN SOURCE CLIENT /// <> FIRST RELEASE 100+ Downloads!
channel.description:
First of all....
Credits to: 70% to Ice Storm for putting up client source 30% to me for editing sprites and adding models
(This client has the title God Scape to show credits towards Ice storm) [size=13pt]PLEASE REP IF U LIKE IT!!![/size] Client Download:[size=20pt][url=http://uppit.com/v/5T2DMFXQ]http://uppit.com/v/5T2DMFXQ[/url][/size]
Some Pictures:
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/untitled.png[/img]
Client Download: http://uppit.com/v/5T2DMFXQ
Customs compatible with client: Bandos legs Dragon Plate Body Flame Bow Black Ahrims Body Black Arhims Bottom Black Arhims hood Blue Ahrims set (above) Gold ahrims set (above) Uber Sword Donor Shield Donor Cape (t)
Thank you for looking at this post... please comment 1 - 10
PLEASE DONT FLAME. IM NEW AND THIS IS MY FIRST RELEASE
Please also notify me what I can do to next client to make it better...
